description: This file defines React components related to displaying statistical summary cards within an admin dashboard of an e-commerce platform. It includes a 'StatCard' component for individual statistic display and a 'StatCards' component that aggregates multiple 'StatCard's in a grid layout.

methods.name: StatCard({ title, value, hint })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a card with a title, value, and optional hint.

methods.name: StatCards
methods.description: React functional component that renders a grid of multiple 'StatCard' components with predefined statistics.
